resources.string: Chombo chimwe nechimwe chakagadzirirwa chidanho chakasiyana- mumashure, iyezvino kana zvaitika.
GodTools inokutungamirira paunobetsera mumwe munhu kunzwisisa vhangeri uye kusangana naJesu
Unogona kugoverana sikirini uri kure kuiitira kuti mumwe munhu akwanise kutevera paunenge uchishandisa chombo kutaurirana nezvevhangeri.
Muchidzidzo chimwe nechimwe cheGodTools unodzidza chimwe chinhu chinokubatsira kuti uve nenhaurirano dzechokwadi pamusoro paMwari.
Wana dzidziso iyi panowanikwa zvinhu pese paungaidira.
